name: Poly Breakout
description:
PolyBreakout

This is a game I had started building but realized that the idea was too big and I had been burned out. I decided to upload this to help other creators get inspiration. If enough people want me to start making the game again, I will.

Movement

WASD  - Movement left, right, up, and down (For Square and Triangle)

Mouse - Circle swings from the point it hits the wall

Mouse + Left Shift - Circle attaches to and goes to the point on the wall the rope lands

Space - Switch the character
